de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.utils
Class ImageScaler

java.lang.Object
  de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.utils.ImageScaler

public class ImageScaler
extends java.lang.Object

This utility is used to scale images but keeping their ratio. Also integrates methods useful for managing files.

Version:
1.0.3
Author:
Dr. Franz Graf (http://frickelblog.wordpress.com/fast-image-scaling), Matthias Gianfelice

scaleByHalf

private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage scaleByHalf(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                                        java.awt.Dimension d)
